name: Live Life
description:
Live Life-A Life Simulator Game!

Live Life is a life simulator game inspired by InstLife and BitLife. At the moment, it is in very early stages of development and has a long way to go. Live Life is a school project.

Current Content:

  • Customise your life with the Custom Character Creator
  • Perform hobbies and master them!
  • Get a job or study hard to get a better job
  • Encounter random scenarios and funny puns
  • Easter eggs included!

Content in the future:

  • Purchase houses, cars, pets and businesses!
  • Play with up to 4 players in total in a turn based mode and see who has the best life
  • Even more random scenarios
  • Even more easter eggs
  • Plus more!
